text: Midnight Sun is the second album by The Ghost of a Saber Tooth Tiger. The album was recorded on a farm belonging to Sean Lennon and Charlotte Kemp Muhl. ==Track listing== #Too Deep #Xanadu #Animals #Johannesburg #Midnight Sun #Last Call #Devil You Know #Golden Earring #Great Expectations #Poor Paul Getty #Don't Look Back Orpheus #Moth To A Flame ==Reception== Will Hermes of Rolling Stone gave the album three and a half stars and said "This is a rock record, no apologies." Al Horner of NME gave it four stars PopMatters described it as "practically dripping of the hippy, dippy late '60s" and called it "a near perfect album." ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Sean Lennon albums
